I entreat of the church members in every city that they lay hold upon the Lord with determined effort for the baptism of the Holy Spirit. Be assured that Satan is not asleep. Every obstacle possible he will place in the way of whose who would advance in this work. Too often these obstacles 


                                   -109- 

are regarded as insurmountable. Let every one now be soundly and truly converted, and then lay hold of the work intelligently and with faith.--Letter 148, 1909. (To Brother and Sister Starr, December 2, 1909.) 

Released June 18, 1975.
